page.title: 12CLUBS AND SOCIETIES.
page.content: There are lots of clubs and societies available for the people of Whickham and Rowland's Gill to join if they wish. Those available in Whickham include:a Theatre Club, an Art Club, a Gardening Club,a Choral Union and a Floral Art Club. There is also the Whickham Round Table,Whickham Lions,the Townswomen's Guild and the Women's Institute. In the Rowland's Gill and Winlaton area there are clubs such as:an Art Club, a Photography Club, a Local History Society, a Darby and Joan Club, an Over Sixties' Club, a Gardeners' Association and a branch of the Rotary Club.
